errors.inactiveAccount: User account is inactive. Please contact an administrator.
errors.insufficientPrivileges: The user doesn't have enough privileges
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
errors.accountLocked: Account is temporarily locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Try again after {{time}}.
errors.invalidTokenType: Invalid token type. Expected refresh token.

provider.unavailable: Ollama service is not available. Please ensure Ollama is running.
provider.openRouterKeyMissing: OpenRouter API key not configured. Please set it in settings first.

settings.maxTokensPositive: max_tokens must be a positive integer
settings.temperatureRange: temperature must be a number between 0.0 and 1.5

notifications.unauthorizedView: Not authorized to view these notifications

arasaac.downloadFailed: Failed to download image from ARASAAC

guardian.onlyTeachersAdmins: Only teachers and admins can access guardian profiles
guardian.onlyForStudents: Guardian profiles are only for students
guardian.noProfileCreateFirst: No profile exists for this student. Create one first.
guardian.templateNotExist: Template '{{name}}' does not exist. Use /templates to see available templates.
guardian.profileExists: Profile already exists for this student. Use PUT to update.
guardian.onlyAdminsDelete: Only admins can delete guardian profiles
guardian.noProfile: No profile exists for this student

auth.accountInactive: Account is inactive. Please contact an administrator.
auth.configError: Account configuration error. Please contact administrator.
auth.unauthorizedUserList: Not authorized to view user list
auth.unauthorizedUserView: Not authorized to view this user
auth.cannotChangeOtherUserPassword: Cannot change another user's password via this endpoint
auth.invalidUserType: Invalid user type. Must be one of: {{types}}

export.unauthorizedExport: Not authorized to export data for this user
export.unauthorizedImport: Not authorized to import data for another user

boards.invalidFileType: Invalid file type; only images are allowed
boards.symbolInUse: Symbol is in use on boards; remove or use force=true
boards.unauthorizedAssignments: Not authorized to view these assignments
boards.cannotCreateBoardForOther: Cannot create board for another user
boards.aiProviderRequired: AI provider and model are required when AI is enabled
boards.aiProviderInvalid: AI provider must be either 'ollama' or 'openrouter'
boards.unauthorizedSuggestions: Not authorized to generate suggestions for this board
boards.aiNotEnabled: AI is not enabled for this board
boards.aiNotConfigured: AI provider or model is not configured for this board
boards.unauthorizedModifyBoard: Not authorized to modify this board
boards.suggestionLabelRequired: Suggestion item with a label is required
boards.unauthorizedViewBoard: Not authorized to view this board
boards.symbolNotFoundOnBoard: Symbol not found on this board
boards.unauthorizedAssign: Not authorized to assign this board
boards.unauthorizedUnassign: Not authorized to unassign this board

achievements.unauthorizedView: Not authorized to view these achievements
achievements.unauthorizedCheck: Not authorized to check these achievements
